00015 #include "interfacelistconnector.h"
00016 #include "driver.h"
00017 
00018 #include <qtable.h>
00019 #include <qlineedit.h>
00020 #include <qcombobox.h>
00021 #include <qpushbutton.h>
00022 #include <qspinbox.h>
00023 #include <kiconloader.h>
00024 #include <kapplication.h>
00025 
00026 XInterfaceListConnector::XInterfaceListConnector(
00027     const shared_ptr<XInterfaceList> &node, QTable *item)
00028     : XListQConnector(node, item), m_interfaceList(node)
00029 {
00030     connect(m_pItem, SIGNAL( clicked( int, int, int, const QPoint& )),
00031             this, SLOT(clicked( int, int, int, const QPoint& )) );
00032     item->setNumCols(5);
00033     double def = 50;
00034     item->setColumnWidth(0, (int)(def * 1.5));
00035     item->setColumnWidth(1, (int)(def * 1.2));
00036     item->setColumnWidth(2, (int)(def * 2));
00037     item->setColumnWidth(3, (int)(def * 1));
00038     item->setColumnWidth(4, (int)(def * 1));
00039     QStringList labels;
00040     labels += KAME::i18n("Driver");
00041     labels += KAME::i18n("Control");
00042     labels += KAME::i18n("Device");
00043     labels += KAME::i18n("Port");
00044     labels += KAME::i18n("Addr");
00045     item->setColumnLabels(labels);
00046 
00047     atomic_shared_ptr<const XNode::NodeList> list(node->children());
00048     if(list) { 
00049         for(XNode::NodeList::const_iterator it = list->begin(); it != list->end(); it++)
00050             onCatch(*it);
00051     }
00052 }
00053 
00054 void
00055 XInterfaceListConnector::onControlChanged(const shared_ptr<XValueNodeBase> &node)
00056 {
00057     for(tconslist::iterator it = m_cons.begin(); it != m_cons.end(); it++)
00058     {
00059         if(it->interface->control() == node)
00060         {
00061             KApplication *app = KApplication::kApplication();
00062             if(*it->interface->control()) {
00063                 it->btn->setIconSet( app->iconLoader()->loadIconSet("stop", 
00064                                                                     KIcon::Toolbar, KIcon::SizeSmall, true ) );
00065                 it->btn->setText(KAME::i18n("&STOP"));
00066             }
00067             else {
00068                 it->btn->setIconSet( app->iconLoader()->loadIconSet("run", 
00069                                                                     KIcon::Toolbar, KIcon::SizeSmall, true ) );
00070                 it->btn->setText(KAME::i18n("&RUN"));
00071             }
00072         }
00073     }
00074 }
00075 void
00076 XInterfaceListConnector::onCatch(const shared_ptr<XNode> &node) {
00077     shared_ptr<XInterface> interface = dynamic_pointer_cast<XInterface>(node);
00078     int i = m_pItem->numRows();
00079     m_pItem->insertRows(i);
00080     m_pItem->setText(i, 0, interface->getLabel());
00081     struct tcons con;
00082     con.interface = interface;
00083     con.btn = new QPushButton(m_pItem);
00084     con.btn->setToggleButton(true);
00085     con.btn->setAutoDefault(false);
00086     con.btn->setFlat(true);
00087     con.concontrol = xqcon_create<XQToggleButtonConnector>(interface->control(), con.btn);    
00088     m_pItem->setCellWidget(i, 1, con.btn);
00089     QComboBox *cmbdev(new QComboBox(m_pItem) );
00090     con.condev = xqcon_create<XQComboBoxConnector>(interface->device(), cmbdev);
00091     m_pItem->setCellWidget(i, 2, cmbdev);
00092     QLineEdit *edPort(new QLineEdit(m_pItem) );
00093     con.conport = xqcon_create<XQLineEditConnector>(interface->port(), edPort, false);
00094     m_pItem->setCellWidget(i, 3, edPort);
00095     QSpinBox *numAddr(new QSpinBox(0, 32, 1, m_pItem) );
00096     con.conaddr = xqcon_create<XQSpinBoxConnector>(interface->address(), numAddr);
00097     m_pItem->setCellWidget(i, 4, numAddr);
00098     con.lsnOnControlChanged = interface->control()->onValueChanged().connectWeak(
00099         shared_from_this(), &XInterfaceListConnector::onControlChanged,
00100         XListener::FLAG_MAIN_THREAD_CALL);
00101     m_cons.push_back(con);
00102     onControlChanged(interface->control());
00103 }
00104 void
00105 XInterfaceListConnector::onRelease(const shared_ptr<XNode> &node) {
00106     for(tconslist::iterator it = m_cons.begin(); it != m_cons.end();)
00107     {
00108         if(it->interface == node)
00109         {
00110             for(int i = 0; i < m_pItem->numRows(); i++)
00111             {
00112                 if(m_pItem->cellWidget(i, 1) == it->btn) m_pItem->removeRow(i);
00113             }
00114             it = m_cons.erase(it);
00115         }
00116         else
00117         {
00118             it++;
00119         }    
00120     }  
00121 }
00122 void
00123 XInterfaceListConnector::clicked ( int row, int , int , const QPoint& ) {
00124     for(tconslist::iterator it = m_cons.begin(); it != m_cons.end(); it++)
00125     {
00126         if(m_pItem->cellWidget(row, 1) == it->btn)
00127             it->interface->driver()->showForms();
00128     }
00129 }
